role.title: Wordpress and PHP Developer
role.description: For a book website we are looking for an experienced PHP and Mysql developer. Currently the website runs on a Mysql database together with PHP. We have created a new, responsive, design. This design is already created in HTML and CSS.The website consists of aprox. 3700 authors and 20000 books. We need somebody who is able to fully recreate the website in PHP and Mysql and create the CMS to add new authors. Also some new functionalities will be added.Please note: we don't want to use a PHP framework, we want the code to be made from scratch, fully custom.We will use Phpmyadmin for Mysql management and PHP 5.5 (however, it is possible to upgrade to the latest PHP version if needed).We fully explained each page in detail in a document of aprox. 30 pages. More information will be given when we think there is a match between us
